msbt.message: Thanks for the b-day gift! Sending me a card was already a cool thing to do, and the present was like the cherry on top of the "you" sundae. I figured the least I could do was get you something too!

What's the big idea, trying to make me cry?! My heart got all tight and squeezy when I opened your card and present. It doesn't really stack up with what you gave me, but I wanna give you this anyway.
Yo, it was super cool of you to send a present along with the card. After all, the only thing better than mail day is package day! Which you probably know, since you just got a package from me. Woo!
I got your b-day card! That was super thoughtful of you. Doesn't matter how old I get, as long as I got friends to keep the party going, then I'm having a blast. So yeah! Let's keep it going!

I did a double take this morning when I saw your b-day card in my mailbox! You sly spy, pulling such a classy move like it's no big deal. Well, it was a big deal to me! I'm STILL smiling! So, thanks again.

Your b-day card sure put a smile on my face. Thanks, buddy. You're always setting a good example when it comes to being a stand-up friend. I feel like my next year of being alive is off to a rockin' start!
